feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.40.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Support IP fragmentation in userspace by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3639
  • [client] Handle truncated upstream DNS responses by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3632
  • [misc] add git town workflow config by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3555
  • [client] Support CNAME in local resolver by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3646
  • [management] use permission modules by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3622
  • [client] Fix dns cleanup race condition by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3652

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.40.0...v0.40.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.41.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ci] include stash in pr template by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3657
  • [docs] Fix a few typos on table by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3658
  • [management,client] Add support to configurable prompt login by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3660
  • [management] remove unnecessary access control middleware by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3650
  • [management] Buffer updateAccountPeers calls by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3644
  • [management] Refactor/management/updchannel by @crn4 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3645

New Contributors

  • @crn4 made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3645

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.40.1...v0.41.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.41.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] add permissions manager to geolocation handler by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3665
  • [client] Refactor DNSForwarder to improve handle wildcard domain resource id matching by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3651
  • [client] Add heap profile to debug bundle by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3679
  • [client] Add remaining debug profiles by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3681
  • [management] get current user endpoint by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3666

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.41.0...v0.41.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.41.2
entry.content:
This version addresses a potential memory leak caused by our P2P negotiation library.

What's Changed

  • [client] Remove logrus writer assignment in pion logging by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3684

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.41.1...v0.41.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.41.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Set up signal to generate debug bundles by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3683
  • [client] Keep selecting new networks after first deselection by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3671
  • [misc] update gpt file permissions in install.sh by @Lamera in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3663
  • [client] Fix Rosenpass permissive mode handling by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3689

New Contributors

  • @Lamera made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3663

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.41.2...v0.41.3
